intro.title: Introduction — What is Soul+Ocean?
intro.body: Soul+Ocean is a wellbeing community and movement born in the Canary Islands to help you reconnect with your energy, clarity and purpose. We believe wellbeing spreads like a wave: when you truly take care of yourself, you spread health and vitality to those around you.
bullets: Essence: authenticity, connection, science + consciousness, sustainable results.
What we do: coaching, programmes and experiences that integrate conscious nutrition, emotional management and real‑life habits.
Who for: active professionals and sporty/active people who want more energy, focus and freedom with food.

promise.title: Brand Promise
promise.quote: I help you transform your relationship with food, your body and your energy so you can live with more vitality, clarity and balance—without restrictive diets. My wellbeing is contagious, and I want yours to be too.
how_bullets: Practical education with close support and accountability.
Personalised protocols that fit your life (not the other way around).

bio.title: Who is Jasmin Klaus?
bio.badge: Holistic Nutrition & Lifestyle Transformation Coach. Athlete and surfer. WILDFIT® Certified Coach.
bullets: 20+ years in tourism and hospitality leading high‑performance experiences and process improvement.
Integrates emotional intelligence and NLP for deep, sustainable change.
Communicates in German, English and Spanish.
Based in the Canary Islands; in‑person and online work.
bio.quote: Your wellbeing can be your most contagious energy. I’m here to help you activate it.
bio.cta: Meet me and book your Mentoring

pillars.title: What it means to work with Jasmin — 4 pillars

items.title: Define your stress
items.work: Map your stressors (work, emotional, physiological) and their impact on energy, sleep and digestion.
items.result: Personalised regulation strategies, effective pauses and schedule boundaries to regain clarity and performance.

items.title: Learn to set boundaries
items.work: Family and social patterns that drain your energy; assertive communication.
items.result: Healthy, loving boundaries; more balanced relationships and quality time for you.

items.title: Build a routine that holds you
items.work: Realistic rituals (nutrition, movement, rest) that fit your life.
items.result: Frictionless consistency, daily focus and measurable progress.

items.title: The power of self‑care
items.work: Self‑worth and caring habits that nourish body–mind–soul.
items.result: More self‑esteem, steady energy and decisions aligned with your goals.

catalog.title: Jasmin’s Catalogue (defined after your Initial Mentoring)
catalog.note: We always start with the Initial Mentoring Session. From your diagnosis, I’ll recommend the most suitable path.

quiz.title: FAST QUIZ: find your best‑fit programme

q1.question: Which best describes your main goal right now?
options: Regain energy and build sustainable habits. (Coaching 1:1)
Reset my metabolism and relationship with food. (WILDFIT® 90 Day)
Break free from cravings and the diet–guilt cycle. (Food Freedom)
Balance my energy and emotions with daily habits. (Radiant Balance)

q2.question: What’s your biggest challenge with food and wellbeing?
options: Staying consistent and having a personalised plan. (Coaching 1:1)
Following a proven method that guides me step by step. (WILDFIT® 90 Day)
Listening again to my body’s natural signals. (Food Freedom)
Integrating nutrition, rest and movement into my routine. (Radiant Balance)

q3.question: Which format suits you best?
options: Group programme with support and videos. (WILDFIT® 90 Day)
Short, direct pathway for specific changes. (Food Freedom)
Integral programme covering different wellbeing areas. (Radiant Balance)

q4.question: Which outcome excites you most?
options: Clarity and a sustainable plan for my health. (Coaching 1:1)
A root‑and‑branch change to diet and lifestyle. (WILDFIT® 90 Day)
Eat freely without guilt or anxiety. (Food Freedom)
Feel physically and emotionally balanced every day. (Radiant Balance)

products.title: Coaching 1:1 — Personalised Transformation (entry point)
bullets: Format: bespoke sessions | Languages: ES · EN · DE | Modality: in‑person (Canary Islands) and online.
For you if: you want close support to improve nutrition, manage stress, regain energy and build lasting habits.
Includes: tailored session plan + follow‑up and accountability.

products.title: WILDFIT® 90 Day Challenge — Reset your body, reset your life
bullets: Duration: 90 days | Format: online coaching (group + 1:1 support).
Objective: reprogramme your relationship with food and build a sustainable lifestyle.
Includes: 12+ videos with the founder, progress journal, community and the Living WILDFIT eBook.

products.title: FOOD FREEDOM — Return to your natural baseline
bullets: Duration: 6 online sessions | Format: group or individual.
Objective: free yourself from the diet–craving–guilt cycle and recover natural hunger/satiety cues.
Includes: habit reprogramming, nutritional education and ongoing support.

products.title: RADIANT Balance | Young SOULS — 8 weeks
bullets: Duration: 8 weeks | Format: integral online programme.
Objective: sustained energy, emotional balance and daily habits.
Includes: nutrition + meditation + conscious movement; personal organisation and healthy boundaries.
